title: Goose
description:
A white goose in full profile. 

Can be used to talk about the actual animal. Can also be used in the context of idioms including silly goose, wild goose chase, or what's good for the goose is good for the gander. Can also be used to talk about goosebumps or goose pimples. 

Might be used in reference to the children's game duck duck goose.
apple_vendor_description: The goose emoji on Apple devices presents a stately and somewhat proud avian figure, rendered with smooth, white plumage that catches the light, showcasing Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its distinctive S-shaped neck and alert posture, characterized by soft, rounded edges, give it a recognizable and slightly imposing presence. This charmingly detailed emoji on Appleâ€™s platform often symbolizes nature, rural settings, or a feeling of being ruffled or slightly annoyed, conveying a distinct personality.
